sql_list.sql_query: insert into config.tbl_user1 select * from config.tbl_user where id not in (select id from config.tbl_user1);

update config.tbl_user
set col1 = t.col1, col2 = t.col2
from config.tbl_user t
where tbl_user.id = t.id;
insert into config.tbl_user1 select * from config.tbl_user where id not in (select id from config.tbl_user1);
